description: Announces its presence by multicasting <<vol2_clause_dev_23_message_helloc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Hello>> messages to all listening systems.

Listens for <<vol2_clause_dev_23_message_helloc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Hello>> messages to identify any <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>s that it may exchange messages with and further retrieve a <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>'s service capabilities.

Initiates communication by sending <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_probec32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Probe>> or <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_resolvec32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Resolve>> messages to <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>s. Then listens for <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_probe_matchc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134ProbeMatch>> and <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_resolve_matchc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134ResolveMatch>> messages to discover those <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>s that it intends to exchange messages with and further retrieves the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>'s service capabilities.

Listens for <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_probec32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Probe>> and <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_resolvec32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Resolve>> messages, which it responds to with <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_probe_matchc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134ProbeMatch>> or <<vol2_clause_dev_24_message_resolve_matchc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134ResolveMatch>> messages, respectively.
Asks for the resource representation of the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> via the <<vol2_clause_dev_25_message_get_metadatac32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134GetMetadata>> message.

Sends its resource representation to the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_consumer>> via the <<vol2_clause_dev_25_message_get_metadata_responsec32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134GetMetadataResponse>> message.

Initiates communication by first subscribing to a <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> by sending a <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_subscribec32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Subscribe>> message. While the subscription is running, the subscription is kept alive by sending <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_renewc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Renew>> messages and receiving <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_notificationc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Notification>> messages.

Finally, the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_consumer>> unsubscribes from a <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> by sending an <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_unsubscribec32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Unsubscribe>> message.

Listens for <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_subscribec32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Subscribe>>, <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_renewc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Renew>> and <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_unsubscribec32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Unsubscribe>> messages, which it responds to with <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_subscribe_responsec32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134SubscribeResponse>>, <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_renew_responsec32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134RenewResponse>> or <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_unsubscribe_responsec32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134UnsubscribeResponse>> messages respectively.
While a subscription is running, the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> delivers <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_notificationc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Notification>> messages.

When at some point the subscription has to be ended, the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> sends a <<vol2_clause_dev_27_message_subscription_endc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134SubscriptionEnd>> message.

label: Notify Change in System Context and Capabilities

description: Listens for a <<vol2_clause_dev_28_message_notificationc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Notification>> message to retrieve context updates.
While a subscription is running, the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> delivers <<vol2_clause_dev_28_message_notificationc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Notification>> messages.
Listens for a <<vol2_clause_dev_29_message_notificationc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Notification>> message to retrieve update reports.
While a subscription is running, the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> delivers <<vol2_clause_dev_29_message_notificationc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Notification>> messages.

Initiates communication by sending a <<vol2_clause_dev_30_message_getmdibc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134GetMdib>> message to a <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>. Then listens for a <<vol2_clause_dev_30_message_getmdibresponsec32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134GetMdibResponse>> message to retrieve the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>'s MDIB.

Listens for <<vol2_clause_dev_30_message_getmdibc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134GetMdib>> messages, which it responds to with <<vol2_clause_dev_30_message_getmdibresponsec32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134GetMdibResponse>> messages respectively.
Initiates communication by first subscribing to a <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> by sending a {var_label_dev_35_message_subscribe} message.
Listens for {var_label_dev_35_message_subscribe} messages, which it responds to with {var_label_dev_35_message_subscribe_response}.
Listens for a Notification message to retrieve medical data updates.
While a subscription is running, the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> delivers Notification messages.

Initiates communication by sending a {var_label_dev_37_message_getmdib} message to a RefActor:somds_provider[]. Then listens for a {var_label_dev_37_message_getmdibresponse} message to retrieve the RefActor:somds_provider[]'s MDIB.
Listens for {var_label_dev_37_message_getmdib} messages, which it responds to with {var_label_dev_37_message_getmdibresponse} messages respectively.
Initiates communication by first subscribing to a RefActor:somds_consumer[] by sending a {var_label_dev_38_message_subscribe} message.
Listens for {var_label_dev_38_message_subscribe} messages, which it responds to with {var_label_dev_38_message_subscribe_response}.
Listens for a Notification message to retrieve medical alert updates.
While a subscription is running, the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> delivers Notification messages.

Initiates communication by sending a {var_label_dev_40_message_getmdib} message to a RefActor:somds_medical_data_provider[]. Then listens for a {var_label_dev_40_message_getmdibresponse} message to retrieve the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>'s MDIB.
Listens for {var_label_dev_40_message_getmdib} messages, which it responds to with {var_label_dev_40_message_getmdibresponse} messages respectively.
Listens for <<vol2_clause_dev_46_message_helloc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Hello>> or
<<vol2_clause_dev_46_message_byec32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Bye>> messages to add or
remove <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>> endpoint metadata to/from its
internal database.
When joining a <<acronym_somds>>, it announces its presence to the
<<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_discovery_proxy>>. When deliberately leaving the
<<acronym_somds>>, it announces its absence to the <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_discovery_proxy>>.
Forwards <<vol2_clause_dev_46_message_helloc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Hello>>
and <<vol2_clause_dev_46_message_helloc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Bye>>
messages received from <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_somds_provider>>s.
Responds to incoming <<vol2_clause_dev_47_message_probec32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Probe>>
and <<vol2_clause_dev_47_message_resolvec32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Resolve>> messages.
Uses <<vol2_clause_dev_47_message_probec32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Probe>> and
<<vol2_clause_dev_47_message_resolvec32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Resolve>>
messages to seek endpoint metadata.
Optionally subscribes to a <<vol1_spec_sdpi_p_actor_discovery_proxy>> in order
to receive <<vol2_clause_dev_47_message_helloc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Hello>>
and <<vol2_clause_dev_47_message_helloc32d5907-c7e4-4b5b-9ab6-049726004134Bye>> messages.
